gen

Class Hyperparams

  • java.lang.Object
    • gen.Hyperparams

  • public class Hyperparams
extends Object
    This class stores all hyperparameters used in the generation pipeline. Note that reordering of these hyperparams or adding new ones must also be properly reflected in the PathList.HYPERPARAMS_LIST file.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Hyperparam argInsertionMaxEnt_params_maxProbDecrement
      the maximum probability decrement of INSERT_BETWEEN transitions to consider per vertex with edge matching :ARG[0-9] during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prune(n,r))
      Hyperparam argInsertionMaxEnt_params_takeBestN
      the number of INSERT_BETWEEN transitions to consider per vertex with edge matching :ARG[0-9] during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prunen)
      Hyperparam denomMaxEnt_params_maxProbDecrement
      the maximum probability decrement of syntactic annotation values for key "DENOM" to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prune(n,r))
      Hyperparam denomMaxEnt_params_takeBestN
      the number of syntactic annotation values for key "DENOM" to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prunen)
      Hyperparam denomWeight
      the weight for syntactic annotation key DENOM
      Hyperparam maxNrOfPredictionsPerVertex
      the maximum number of partial transition functions to store per vertex

      the maximum number of REALIZE predictions in total

      the maximum number of REALIZE predictions per POS tag

      the maximum probability decrement for REORDER transitions to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prune(n,r))

      the number of REORDER transitions to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prunen)

      the weight for syntactic annotation key POS
      Hyperparam realizeMaxEnt_params_maxProbDecrement
      the maximum probability decrement of REALIZE transitions to consider per vertex and syntactic annotation during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prune(n,r))
      Hyperparam realizeMaxEnt_params_takeBestN
      the number of REALIZE transitions to consider per vertex and syntactic annotation during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prunen)
      Hyperparam tenseMaxEnt_params_maxProbDecrement
      the maximum probability decrement of syntactic annotation values for key "TENSE" to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prune(n,r))

      the number of syntactic annotation values for key "TENSE" to consider per vertex during the generation process (see Definition 4.9, prunen)

      the weight for syntactic annotation key TENSE
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_afterInsWeight
      the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = right
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_articleLmWeight
      In the language model score, we divide by the number of words, but articles are not counted as full words, but instead weighted with this factor.
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_articleSmoothing
      a smoothing factor added to the probabilities of denominators
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_beforeInsArgWeight
      the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_beforeInsWeight
      the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is not a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)

      the probability assigned to default realizations
      Hyperparam vertexTranslator_lmWeight
      the weight for the language model term in the score function of our model

      the weight for REALIZE transitions

      • vertexTranslator_beforeInsArgWeight

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_beforeInsArgWeight
        the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)

      • vertexTranslator_beforeInsWeight

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_beforeInsWeight
        the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = left if the edge connecting σ1 and β1 is not a PropBank core role (ARG0 - ARG5)

      • vertexTranslator_afterInsWeight

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_afterInsWeight
        the weight for INSERT-BETWEEN transitions with p = right

      • vertexTranslator_defaultRealizationScore

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_defaultRealizationScore
        the probability assigned to default realizations

      • vertexTranslator_articleSmoothing

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_articleSmoothing
        a smoothing factor added to the probabilities of denominators

      • vertexTranslator_articleLmWeight

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_articleLmWeight
        In the language model score, we divide by the number of words, but articles are not counted as full words, but instead weighted with this factor. This is to prevent the insertion of too many articles as in general, they are strongly favoured by the language model.

      • vertexTranslator_reorderingWeight

        public Hyperparam vertexTranslator_reorderingWeight
        the weight for REORDER transitions

      • maxNrOfRealizePredictionsPerPos

        public Hyperparam maxNrOfRealizePredictionsPerPos
        the maximum number of REALIZE predictions per POS tag
